Playable Races

Common

  • Human
  • Elf
  • Dwarf
  • Halfling
  • Gnome

Uncommon

  • Aasimar (Human + Celestial)
  • Half-Elf (Human + Elf)
  • Dragonborn (Human + Dragon)
  • Firbolg
  • Goliath
  • Half-Orc (Human + Orc)
  • Lizardfolk
  • Orc
  • Tiefling (Human + Devil; often mistrusted)

Talk to the GM about playing anything below this line!

Weird

Note: If you choose one of these options, you may be the only member of your race you ever see throughout your campaign, and there is not guaranteed to be a group of them anywhere in this setting (check with the GM when creating your backstory). Many of them are from other planes or worlds, and you may be the only one to have crossed over somehow.

  • Aarakocra
  • Centaur [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Genasi (Human + Genie)
  • Gith
  • Grung
  • Kobold
  • Leonin [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Locathah
  • Loxodon [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Satyr [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Tabaxi
  • Tortle
  • Triton
  • Vedalken [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Verdan

Monsters

Note: Discuss with your party and GM before playing one of these, as it can affect the entire party and campaign (you may even be attacked on sight)

  • Bugbear [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Changeling (Human + Doppelganger)
  • Goblin
  • Hobgoblin [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Minotaur [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Shifter (Human + Lycanthrope)
  • Simic Hybrid [DIFFERENT LORE]
  • Yuan-Ti Pureblood [DIFFERENT LORE]

Non-playable in this setting

  • Kalashtar (no plane of dreams and ghosts are not usually lawful good)
  • Kenku (get GM permission if you REALLY want to roleplay a character with no voice of its own)
  • Warforged (mechanical constructs are very different here than in Eberon)
  • Anything not yet on this list; see GM
